statements: UPDATE inventory_management SET quantity = 50, min_stock = 10 WHERE product_id = 101;
UPDATE inventory_management SET max_stock = 100, timestamp = '2022-01-15 08:00:00' WHERE product_name = 'Laptop';
UPDATE inventory_management SET quantity = quantity + 10, timestamp = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE product_id = 100
UPDATE inventory_management SET min_stock = 20, max_stock = 100 WHERE product_name = 'Product ABC'
UPDATE inventory_items SET item_quantity = 50 WHERE item_id = 1;
UPDATE orders SET quantity_ordered = 10, order_date = '2022-03-15' WHERE order_id = 3;
UPDATE inventory_items SET item_quantity = 10 WHERE item_id = 1;
UPDATE orders SET quantity_ordered = 5, order_date = '2023-10-15' WHERE item_id = 2 AND order_id = 100;
UPDATE Inventory SET quantity = 50 WHERE item_id = 101;
UPDATE Stockouts SET reason = 'Damaged item' WHERE stockout_id = 201;
UPDATE Inventory SET quantity = quantity - 5 WHERE item_id = 101;
UPDATE Stockouts SET reason = 'Damaged item' WHERE stockout_id = 201;
UPDATE Inventory SET stock_level = 50, min_stock_level = 10 WHERE product_id = 1;
UPDATE Purchases SET quantity = 20, price = 15.99 WHERE purchase_id = 3;
UPDATE Inventory SET stock_level = 50, max_stock_level = 100 WHERE product_id = 1;
UPDATE Suppliers SET contact_person = 'John Doe', email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE supplier_id = 1;
UPDATE products SET quantity_in_stock = 50, reorder_level = 20 WHERE product_id = 1234;
UPDATE customers SET email = 'newemail@example.com' WHERE customer_id = 5678;
UPDATE products SET quantity_in_stock = quantity_in_stock - 10, reorder_level = 20 WHERE product_id = 1
UPDATE suppliers SET contact_person = 'John Doe', contact_number = '+1234567890' WHERE supplier_id = 2
